name: CLKGaugeProvider
desc: An abstract superclass that provides all the common behaviors for the gauge providers.

items.name: var gaugeColorLocations: [NSNumber]?
items.desc: The location of each color in a multicolor gauge’s gradient.

items.name: var style: CLKGaugeProviderStyle
items.desc: The style that defines the gauge’s appearance.

items.name: var accessibilityLabel: String?
items.desc: A localized string that describes the gague.
